== Icon inconsistency ==

Bug #151294

the home and desktop icons in the places menu are not picked up from the edubuntu icontheme

== no cdrom and sound on very fast thin clients ==

Bug #153355

on thin clients with more than 2GHz the possibility exists that they boot without existing sound and CDrom device.

== switch user option broken on thin clients ==

Bug #153356

on thin clients the switch user option is available in teh logout dialog and returns an error if you want to use it.

== certain intel cards not working properly on thin clients ==

Bug #149006

On certain intel cards it is necessary to forcefully enable 24bit colordepth in the ltsp configuration to make them work properly.
